tweets.text: @squirreljack500 @EnvAgencyNW @VolkerStevinUK The flood wall is complete and providing protection to homes and businesses. There is still some more work to do on the overall scheme though, so the cycle path is due to reopen in March. Thanks.

On the 5th day of Christmas #TeamEA gave to me, a Flood & Coastal Erosion Strategy! 

This year we launched a plan to help protect & prepare millions of people & businesses from #flooding & impacts of #ClimateChange

Spot some of our local team in this video

@stewart_mounsey https://t.co/7uTP2x1X86

tweets.text: High tide at Mevagissey this morning. Approx 450mm of additional sea level due to surge from the weather & wave action onto the South coast.  Great to see most properties had heeded @EnvAgency flood warnings and installed their flood boards to stop the sea entering the buildings https://t.co/4mbWArOY9E

domain.description: Ongoing News Stories like 'Brexit'

tweets.text: @AlsoknownasChin @EnvAgencySW Yeah just behind the football fields / below the old Skate park.

We are delighted to announce our 'Bringing the Limestone Becks back to Life' project on the lower Branston Beck has been awarded a grant from the  #GreenRecoveryChallengeFund 
A great project that will transform this section of the beck for people and wildlife #lovelincsrivers https://t.co/CiT8EBaSa4
@dtrevains1 @EnvAgencySW Where is this Dave? Behind the football fields?

Our flood storage area at Pendower Meadow, upstream of #Bodmin, held back floodwater today, protecting up to 14 properties from flooding downstream in the town.  Water is held back and released in a controlled way into the Bodmin Town Leat. https://t.co/dH1QMd8s0s
@EnvAgencySW Was really interesting to see Pendower Meadow in operation this morning and the lack of impacts within the town.

ICYMI Last week we hosted the Adaptation & Resilience webinar with speakers from @EnvAgency & @Hullccnews and support from @thecarbontrust & @UKinUSA.

You can listen to the recording here üëá
#adaptation #resilience #cleangrowth
https://t.co/Tad2VOYPzp
@LancasterCC @EnvAgencyNW @VolkerStevinUK Does this mean the cycle track will be reopened?

Fantastic! The #Boston Barrier provides better long term protection to the local community in #Lincolnshire from East Coast storm surges. It's also the first major construction project undertaken by @EnvAgency where we mapped work against the @GlobalGoalsUN https://t.co/kdOIqQFqy7

tweets.text:
A court has ruled that air pollution made a material contribution to the death of 9-year old Ella Kissi-Debrah, marking the first time a person in the UK has had air pollution listed as a cause of death. 

https://t.co/vBgUcqWpk0

London is facing a water crisis and @EnvAgency say England could be short of water within 25 yrs. @hwmwater provides leak detection equipment helping water conservation and safeguard the UK‚Äôs water future. Find out how: https://t.co/QMolcTS4jv #waterforlife #safercleanerhealthier https://t.co/GS74P9loeG
Today‚Äôs batch of fish from @FishFarmEA Roach tomorrow but where too? @EnvAgencyNW https://t.co/Xr1RBMlEfD
Be careful along beaches, promenades and coastal footpaths and roads as large waves can be dangerous. #staysafe https://t.co/E32KKz9wzr

tweets.text:
The recent heavy rain was a good opportunity to check on 1 of last year's river restoration projects. Designed to let the floodwater connect to its floodplain - fair to say, its working! 
Nice project with @EnvAgencyNW @EdenRiversTrust @ollyolly092 @WoodlandTrust @herdyshepherd1 https://t.co/aCdQIt6DZ3

Check out our delivery of 250 metres of temporary flood barrier for East #Cowes on the Isle of Wight. We're working in partnership with @iwight to increase flood protection for local residents and businesses. Great training with  @IslandRoads. https://t.co/6JBLm2vzjf
Good progress on our ¬£3million upgrade of this flood defence screen, which plays an important role in reducing the risk of #flooding to #Sheffield city centre. https://t.co/pKU9Rx0llZ

Preparing with excitement for our 4th meeting of @BuildWithNature standards  board! Great to have UK first green infrastructure benchmark represented by top built and natural env professionals. Key today is the start of BwN review after 5 yrs in operation!

@SteveMooreEA @ianhodgeEA @johncurtinEA @MoretonBack1 @JamesBevanEA The #BostonBarrier was talked about back in 2005, but became more urgent after the 2013 tidal surge. As @SteveMooreEA explains, it's a National Priority Project & contributes to nearly 5% of the @EnvAgency‚Äôs target of better protecting 300,000 homes from flooding by March 2021. https://t.co/wULB1LvehJ

tweets.text:
Please be careful when driving today , there is alot of water from the rain running off the fields and then onto the roads.
One vehicle has already come off the road in the Chorley area, luckily all okay.
#DriveSafely https://t.co/2ey6bPEZgN

Just received this from @EnvAgency

"...current levels of abstraction are causing environmental damage. Any increase in use WITHIN EXISTING LICENSED VOLUMES will increase the pressure on a system that is already failing environmental targets." 

Thread 1/2 https://t.co/1mnOuVTXt7

ICYM - UK warned to prepare for risk of winter flooding 

 - @EnvAgency urges people in flood zones to plan ahead as @metoffice forecasts wet January and February

https://t.co/1uUVsFnlAS

Combining flood defences & nature is snow good! 

#DYK Salford flood storage reservoir completed in 2018 holds more than 250 Olympic-sized swimming pools‚Äô of water & its embankments are covered in wildflower habitat to attract pollinators

Find out more ‚û°Ô∏èhttps://t.co/RuiHRTlCxM https://t.co/ypM5omx10N

@DouglasPilot @CuerdenValleyPk @stormwater_jo @GroundworkCLM @Lancswildlife I don‚Äôt get out much these days! @LancsBioBlitz & @EnvAgencyNW may receive more in the way of administrative Lancashire otter ü¶¶ records & @Otter_Project Cardiff in the way of otter cadavers. ‚ò†Ô∏è

@cerivthomas @Matthew_Wright @EnvAgency You only need a few of the "natural" negative variables to sync-up over a few years to take a hit that indeed they can recover from. But repetitive human-driven hits mean a classic decline in the salmon algorithm. That's even without a discussion of the impact on sea ecology.

tweets.text: Today we‚Äôve reached a huge project milestone for #Boston! The #BostonBarrier primary gate is now fully operational on its main hydraulics. This means that now, more than 13,000 homes and businesses in the town are better protected from tidal flooding. https://t.co/ArKOG55WR3

tweets.text: @moogfood @Matthew_Wright @EnvAgency Very sad, despite the killing on a vast scale enough juvenile fish must have survived for a viable fishery, I guess habitat was still good in the 1970's. Then we intensified agriculture, 1980's acid rain & sheep dip, now avian predation, slurry, chicken crap & drought summersüôÅ

Please RT: trailers of waste have been found abandoned across the country, putting the environment at risk.

The Joint Unit for Waste Crime is investigating this.

If you've seen anything, contact Crimestoppers anonymously or call 0800 807060. https://t.co/mNMYwK0bd9
